DOC.brief_summary: The purpose type II diabetes ( T2D ) screen study improve diabetes care minority community identify undiagnosed uncontrolled T2D patient , well help patient without regular primary care physician ( PCP ) find one within community . These goal achieve first glucose measurement . Individuals high glucose measurement confirm rapid hemoglobin A1c ( HgA1c ) test . The HgA1c test tell u patient average blood sugar past 3 month , allow u immediately diagnose new uncontrolled type II diabetic . All participant fill survey healthcare seek behavior glucose test . All patient enter study receive education T2D value regularly visit PCP , provide list PCP currently accept new patient within 3 mile radius . Follow-up visit 4 8 month help u determine success community base screening . The investigator hypothesis community base screening design adequate education follow-up , perform qualified medical professional improve diabetes care minority community assess hemoglobin A1c level 8 month , change number patient visit/obtain PCP within study period .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Mellitus Community Based Screening Minority Populations
DOC.criteria: Adults 18 old Type I Diabetes . Women currently pregnant .
